mapper.update:
update act_ru_task
REV_ = #{rev,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EXECUTION_ID_ = #{executionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_INST_ID_ = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_EXECUTION_ID_ = #{caseExecutionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_INST_ID_ = #{caseInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_DEF_ID_ = #{caseDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_TASK_ID_ = #{parentTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION_ = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_DEF_KEY_ = #{taskDefKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_ = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNEE_ = #{assignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELEGATION_ = #{delegation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY_ = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME_ = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DUE_DATE_ = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FOLLOW_UP_DATE_ = #{followUpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUSPENSION_STATE_ = #{suspensionState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update act_ru_task set REV_ = #{rev,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXECUTION_ID_ = #{executionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_INST_ID_ = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_EXECUTION_ID_ = #{caseExecutionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_INST_ID_ = #{caseInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_DEF_ID_ = #{caseDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_TASK_ID_ = #{parentTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION_ = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_DEF_KEY_ = #{taskDefKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_ = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGNEE_ = #{assignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELEGATION_ = #{delegation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY_ = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME_ = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DUE_DATE_ = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FOLLOW_UP_DATE_ = #{followUpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUSPENSION_STATE_ = #{suspensionState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(DISTINCT RES.ID_) FROM ACT_RU_TASK RES LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst HIP on RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = HIP.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_re_procdef DEF on RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = DEF.ID_ WHERE RES.ASSIGNEE_ = #{assignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and HIP.BUSINESS_KEY_ like concat("%",#{name},"%")
